nodes.text: Horil Damlo was a male Human who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Damlo was a minor political functionary who worked for Senator Lavina Wren, on Genarius. He held the unimportant position of Undersecretary to the Assistant Secretary to the Acting Chief of Information for Senator Wren and his job was sit by the door and occasionally to carry out minor errands.
